directions: Beat together eggs and milk in a medium bowl; stir in potatoes, green onions, salt and pepper sauce. Stir in 1 cup of the cheese and half of bacon. Pour into greased 9-inch pie plate or quiche dish.
Bake 25-30 minutes or until center is set. Sprinkle remaining bacon and 1/2 cup cheese over top of pie; continue baking 3 to 4 minutes or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 3 cups Ore-Ida® Shredded Hash Brown Potatoes
1 1/2 cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
4 slices bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled, divided
title: Hash Brown Potato Pie
